IndexPage.title: Hebamedia
IndexPage.description:
Welcome to Hebamedia Information System

.

In this system, everything is consized in three pages. This is the first page.

In the second page (Menu), you can add all your own customized foods under different categories.

In the last Page (Customers), you will be able to reivew, search, add, update and delete your customers.

Please feel free to contact me using the following link if you are facing any problem or question!

Thank you.

AuthorizationPage.title: Authorization
AuthorizationPage.description: We are practicing custom RBAC authorization.
